text: Adubu Mapu Ibungogi Numit adu huranbana lakpagumna lakkani. Numit aduda swarga yamna nin khongbaga loinna mangkhigani; atiya malemgi machak mathum pumnamak meina manghankhigani, aduga malem amasung madugi manungda leiba pot khudingmak iphong phonggani.3:10 Ariba lairik kharadadi “meina chakthokkhigani” haina yao-i
